channel.title: B*A*R*N
channel.description:
"For the Army, By the Army!"
Mini-Norm,SANDMAN,SWAT,Indy, Lerch,Mongo,MsRedneck,MidgetMark69 & Pin, Certified members of the Bubba the Love Sponge Army covering the BTLS show, and all things Bubba.
The B*A*R*N is in no way associated with Bubba the Love Sponge,BTLS.com,BTLS.net or Sirius Satellite Radio. We are just fans being Marks. We love them in a non faggot way.

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network
item.description: Undated...Previously unreleased Pin 69 bit "Midgets Coming Undone" Its a wrap. Peace to the Bubba Army. Good Luck to Bubba and the Crew! Sincere thanks to all our fans and supporters. Bubbaettes stand down. B*A*R*N dismissed.............
item.dc:creator: B*A*R*N Army Radio Network
item.itunes:summary:

B*A*R*N dismissed.............

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 08/11/06
item.description: It's getting Deep as the B*A*R*N releases for the first time to the podcast world www.bubbathelovesponge.net Entrepreneur Double Deluxe DEEP. Not only a Businessman, but a Bubba Mark who cheers for The Broncos, Dale Jr. and is always looking out for the Bubba Army based at www.bubbathelovesponge.net for good deals. Vito & Chloe add to the fun. Mini Norm, Sandman, SWAT, Lerch, MsRedneck, Midgetmark & Indy host it up. Mogo gets his very own Hayloft..WOOT!!! BBQ in February..yes..February...hahahahahahahahha Enjoy..it was the B*A*R*N!

item.dc:creator: B*A*R*N Army Radio Network

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network PILOT 06/06
item.description: From Pirate Radio the very first B*A*R*N show. This is where it all began 06/13/06. The B*A*R*N launched and blew the servers up as it soared to # 1 on the network! Midget Mark & Lerch guest as Mini Norm, Indy, SWAT & SANDMAN host this historic event. Never before on the podcast feeds. Many improvements were to follow as the show progressed but this is the raw B*A*R*N. Gather round Bubbaettes and listen to the B*A*R*N as it began.
item.dc:creator: B*A*R*N Army Radio Network

item.title: B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network
item.description: The Last Episode of the B*A*R*N...... "For the Army, by the Army!" Midgetmark & MsRedneck host the final show. Sincere Thanks to all the listeners and to the people that contributed their time and energy to make the show! Peace from the entire B*A*R*N Family it was fun while it lasted. Mini-Norm Swat Sandman Lerch MsRedneck Midgetmark Mongo Pin XMecutioner & Indy

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 05/17/07
item.description: The B*A*R*N assembles with Mini Norm, SWAT, MsRedneck, Midgetmark, Lerch, Mongo & intern extrodaniare Pin exchange points of view on numerous topics including BTLS MILF Contest,, Bubba and his favorites, Sirius Radios, MsRed and her busy backside, Norm not being psycic & having to do it all, TOOL, and sniffing the glue that holds the B*A*R*N together. Fans of the show are reminded to call 1-866-646-7083 or email the crew @ bubbaarmyradio@yahoo.com. For the Army by the Army it's the B*A*R*N!!!

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 05/03/07
item.description: "The B*A*R*N" For the Army by the Army" It's Nicklehood of Deathsquad, Hey Now & www.howardshrine.net storming the B*A*R*N & performing his new hit single LIVE for the B*A*R*N! See the recorded version at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWnjXN4cXlw Then SWAT, Midgetmark, Pin & Lerch all man up to produce a show covering many relevant topics.You can only hear this show right here as it was not broadcasted live. Its' special, and it's for you! The B*A*R*N !!!

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 04/19/2007
item.description: The B*A*R*N "For the Army, By the Army" Deliverence has arrived & Mini Norm, Mongo, SANDMAN, SWAT, MidgetMark & Pin69 chat it up.Topics included the recent Virgina Tech tragedy, Gun rights, Guitar Hero, Bubba Talk Includes Bubba Raw Live, & a reduced meet and greet schedule,& Tom the Treeman perils. Mongo hulks up & annouces the search for a female intern, and encourages listeners to hit him up for interviews and to be on the show. A return play of the new Pin diddy. A Dave B*A*R*N video and other totaly unrelated typical B*A*R*N bullshit. Enjoy Bubbaetts..it's the B*A*R*N

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 04/12/07
item.description: The B*A*R*N Returning from a weeks hiatus Mini Norm, Lerch, Msredneck, Mongo, MidgetMark69 & the Resident Thrill-Billy SANDMAN shout out loud and come back strong in reference to recent topics including Mini Norm speaking to the critics, The Imus controversy, and a few Bubba Deals mixed in. Pin69 sends in a new diddy, MidgetMark reveals the "Real" Mongo sex tape and SANDMAN with a new connection is heard and brings forth MS. SANDMAN to the virtual studio.That's right, Bubbaettes, SANDMAN can be heard in all his glory. Now you'll get a taste of the REAL SANDMAN!! Unedited, explictit, & hardcore That's right, all you haters, no more distortion, no more broken phrases...HIGH SPEED WILLY! Hang on...it's the B*A*R*N Special Ninja Smoke appearance by SWAT.

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 03/26/07
item.description: For the Army, by the Army Its full house McGillicutty Jones as Mini Norm, SWAT, Indy, MsRedneck, Midgetmark69,Lerch & Mongo gather to talk Bubba, and some off the wall topics as well. Topics include: our favorite shock jock's fantasation that he seems to have with feces...shit sticks, paper in the can, poop in a box, shit hits the fan the list goes on and on. Swinging...could you and would you? Mongo lives the dream as he produces the first audio with some new equipment, is it a work or a shoot...Safe sex in the Great Plains. A Beer League video review. Six dregrees of Bacon by Mongo. Stern calls we follow, visit www.votefortheworst.com and help Sanjaya keep the hits coming. Whats the Angle as UFC & Pride become one? Least we not forget, The recent Lakeland visit of the Killers of Comedy, more Bubba Bombs & Cunty remarks...WHOA....SANDMAN....It's all yours. And that too....The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network #37

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 03/22/07
item.description: For the Army by the Army The B*A*R*N assembles with Mini Norm, Lerch, Msredneck and Indy offering up their takes on the recent going ons in the BTLS world. Segments include the Akira-Spice end all be all that very well may have tarnished the MANCODE forever. It's fight time as Mr. Gene Lasker takes on DBALL fresh from the Glory Hole, and most recently the Green Milk Challenge. Shit hits the fan as Bubba offers a new gimmick for his listeners. And the group talks about the upcoming Killers of Comedy Shoe in Lakeland. Pin69 here in sprit with some new Evil Pranks. and MsRedneck closes it down with a 1FineAries inspired Hayloft. That and more this week! The B*A*R*N SAY IT!!!
item.dc:creator: B*A*R*N Army Radio Network

That and more this week! The B*A*R*N SAY IT!!!

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 03/15/07
item.description: "For the Army by the Army" The B*A*R*N completes testing of the new Ventrilo Servers ( Thanks to www.voice1.us & www.morningshowcentral.com ) and puts together their 35th show. Mini Norm, Mongo, Lerch, MidgetMark69 & B*A*R*N Intern Extraordinaire Pin69 lead us through the week of Bubbadoings including the recent Vegas shows and the Liquid Assing of Akira. SANDMAN laggs behind but soon becomes the focus as rumors of back door Myspace Cricket Harvesting, and the play by play from the chat room are shared with the group. SPLIT NIXON blasts in with EXPLODE www.myspace.com/splitnixon Later in the show ZERO KING tells it like it is with DRUGS WILL KEEP US TOGETHER www.myspace.com/zeroking. Thanks to these great up and coming bands for their tunage. A Special St.Patricks Day message is delivered from www.howardshrine.net Member DAVE, his view, his words, his way! We close with a special Hayloft & message from resident B*A*R*N Sweetheart MsRedneck as she gives details on the upcoming MS Walk , her new HAYLOFT Store, with all proceeds going to the Multiple Sclerosis Society . Click here for more details: www.myspace.com/msredneck. There it is..can I get a "HOW BOUT IT! "The B*A*R*N #35

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 03/08/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army!" This week ZEROKING blasts open the doors as they nail down two tracks from their new CD "THE SWEET SALE OF EXCESS". Andy, Shane, JP, & Chris make up ZEROKING from Huntington WV. You can get the CD deal for a ten spot at their Officilal website www.zerokingband.com and visit www.myspace.com/zeroking to say hey and find out when they will be appearing near you! Thanks Guys!! Closer to the Bubba World a new star is born as B*A*R*N intern PIN69 brings home the back bacon with a stellar performance of "THE B*A*R*N IS ON" WoW!!! This Canadian is no Hoser eh' A true Bubba Mark who fits the B*A*R*N mold nicely. We are now not only an international broadcast but an international staff to boot! How bout it! A big hello to our neighbors to the North! Mini Norm, SANDMAN, Lerch, MsRedneck , Mongo & Indy converse on www.bubbathelovesponge.net topics and the Bubbadomain. The Contest has closed but the calls are all here from the recent Midgetmark69 (who will return next week) SANDMAN MARK T-SHIRT Contest. Enjoy them all as the B*A*R*N Hands will announce the winners on next weeks show. The new BTLS dot-net myspace is looking great and growing daily please sign up and keep your Armystrong by visiting www.myspace.com/btlsdotnet On a serious note and a straight shoot: please support MsRedneck as she will be walking in the upcoming MS Walk to combat Multiple Sclerosis visit http://main.nationalmssociety.org/site/TR?px=2125427&pg=personal&fr_id=3900&s_tafId=5871 to learn more, and please donate what you can to help the National Multiple Sclerosis Society find a cure for MS tomorrow and provide programs to address the needs of people with MS today. Ok Bubbaettes...thats a wrap it's the B*A*R*N!!

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 03/01/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army" SIGN UP...KEEP THE ARMY STRONG GO TO: www.myspace.com/btlsdotnet THIS IS A SHOOT! The B*A*R*N comes in like a Lion complete with a static roar! SANDMAN gives a suprising two cents on the recent Bubba outburst. Midgetmark69 gets props and annoys at the same time. SWAT, Lerch, MsRedneck, & Mongo round out the assembly of B*A*R*N members who would give ya the shirt off their respective backs. Speaking of shirts SANDMAN T's are much in demand and the contest has closed. Thanks to all the valued listeners who called in to try and win one. All the winners submissions will air on next weeks show. Much non-faggot love to Doug from www.bubbathelovesponge.net as the targeted fan site weathers the early spring Bubberstorm. Viva .net!! SAY IT BUBBAETTES!! SWAT offers some of his wisdom and announces the SANDMAN Tri- County O7 Tour kicks into high gear with local apperances throughout the south! Music again is piped in from BOLT and SPLIT NIXON www.myspace.com/boltarmy & www.myspace.com/splitnixon are the sites to hear all the kick ass tunes, no shit y'all these guys Rock. It's all bullshit, all the time...and we wouldn't have it any other way it's the B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network woot woot!! Special thanks to Todd Clem for his recent mention of this internet radio show on his show, every little bit helps! #33

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 02/22/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army !" Skype reeks a bit of havac on the B*A*R*N as the much anticipated MidgetMark Production of YouTube & www.howardshrine.com personality Dave interview runs into difficulty. We will reschedule with DAVE and have him on a future episode. Fear not Bubbaetts the B*A*R*N continues and the show is "still standing" as Mini Norm takes charge and leads to group though the week of Bubbadom, antics, & some great music from B*A*R*N favorites BOLT www.myspace.com/boltarmy & SPLIT NIXON www.myspace.com/splitnixon check em out and let them know where ya found em! . SANDMAN, SWAT and Indy join together again as MsRedneck, Midgetmark69 & Mongo bounce in and out. Highlights include SWAT and the Captain, MidgetMark and SANDMAN verbally spar, and a brand spanking new HAYLOFT from Ms.Redneck. New T-Shirt designs run wild as www.bubbathelovesponge.net looks for the perfect uniform change for the Official Bubba Army and updates on the SANDMAN MARK T contest. Speaking of the Resident Thrill-Billy, we bring back the exclusive BBQ Hogs interview to honor the BBQ that never was...just sayin! Special apperence from www.morningshowcentral.com & Radio personality Chris who offers a deal that the B*A*R*N may not be able to refuse...all for you Bubbaetts.B*A*R*N Style! #32

Speaking of the Resident Thrill-Billy, we bring back the exclusive BBQ Hogs interview to honor the BBQ that never was...just sayin! Special apperence from www.morningshowcentral.com & Radio personality Chris who offers a deal that the B*A*R*N may not be able to refuse...all for you Bubbaetts.B*A*R*N Style!
#32

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 02/15/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army!" Canadian, FTE, & SANDMAN SUPERMARK Pin69 claims the first ever limited edition SANDMAN MARK T Shirt from the phone in contest. He brings it straight from the heart with a SOLID Rendition Cash style! It's not to late Bubbaettes and two shirts remain to be claimed,but time is running out. Call 1-866-646-7083 take a shot at a Collectors Edition T. Split Nixon hails from Ashland Kentucky and they bust into the B*A*R*N to deliver some wicked licks and vocals with two tracks "Broke" & "Explode" Thanks to Brian,Jamie,Jason,& Scott!! You can check out Split Nixon @ www.myspace.com/splitnixon SAY IT! and spread the word and buy a CD and a T Shirt.. Oh yeah..Bubba had a show on Sirius, and Mini Norm, Sandman, Lerch MsRedneck Midgetmark & Mongo talk about it. Congrats to Howard and Beth as the King of Media commits to make an honest woman of the beautiful super-model. Other topics include the resurgence of www.bubbathelovesponge.net a discussion of the WGAS pissoff, and Midgetmark ranting on homophobia (Hey just for fun count the FBombs) MsRedneck promises a Hayloft next week (keep in mind that she has been working hard bringing in all the great music) Good times ...It's the B*A*R*N The Bubba Army Radio Network...... #31

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 02/08/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army !" How bout it Bubbaettes! After all the heat from last weeks show it feels like spring in the B*A*R*N, good! Great to know y'all are paying attention. We bring it back this week in our 30th show filled with Bubbadom, New Music, New Fans, New NFL Champs (go Colts just sayin...} It's a full house with Mini Norm, Mongo, MsRedneck,SWAT, SANDMAN, Lerch, (Hi Lisa) MidgetMark, & even Indy who pops in for a bit. Check out the kick ass band BOLT that cracked out "Junkie & Wasted Time" Bolts new cuts that we featured this week. Contact BOLT @ www.myspace.com/boltarmy and let Jason Miller and BOLT hear from ya! Thanks Jason!! Midgetmark give the SANDMAN T-Shirt Details, Sandman by popular demand misses the bullet and goes through the floor as the "Gayloft" re-haunts the resident Superstar. In addition the calls keep coming for the SANDMAN Mark T-Shits that MidgetMark is making up...listen to the end of the show to hear some real good ones...International Style...SAT IY!! All for you this week from the B*A*R*N ! #30

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 02/01/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army!" The B*A*R*N discusses frankly the future of their show as Bubba the Love Sponge once again delivers disrepection at its finest to the rank and file of the Army based at the Official Fan Site of Bubba the Love Sponge www.bubbathelovesponge.net Mini Norm, SANDMAN, Lerch, Mongo, Midgetmark69, & XMecutioner,review the latest on air greasing as Bubba continues the Gary Coxe-ing of his listeners with WGAS Darkside rehtoric Can we be honest...gettin greased is gettin fermented. Refried Shit SAY IT! Speaking of re... It's re-tooling as the website & server go MIA and the show hitch hikes a live feed from the good peeps at www.morningshowcentral.com Thanks MSC! We love ya in a non faggot way. On a lighter note RedRyder is the winner of the Bubba Army T-shirt for being the winning caller, Midget offers up his own T Shirts, Sandman continues to struggle with his fame. and the Hands offer up their picks for Sundays Super Game. It's real, its, honest, it's the B*A*R*N and it's for you. #29 (please note). *1. The B*A*R*N would like to thank ManiacBA for his, time,work, and resourses that he gave freely to the project. *2 Oh yeah..Indy wanted to say "GO COLTS..!"

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 01/24/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army!" The B*A*R*N goes live and the website goes dead, not to worry Bubbaettes it wont keep us down. Mini Norm, Mongo SWAT, MsRedneck, XM & Indy keep it together. XM gives his rebutal to a recent Christmas Greeting, Bubba BBQ news, the upcoming Super Bowl and a Super Rub-Off. The Ned show recap, and what is the common denominator when you factor Elton John & Richard Simmons in the same sentence. Much compassion & non faggot love to Bubba the Love Sponge as he heals. Resident Superstar & Certified Thrill-billy SANDMAN helps to close down the show. Que Paso!!! It's the B*A*R*N still alive and well! #28

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 01/20/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army!" SWAT returns home to the B*A*R*N and we all hope he is home to stay! Certified Thrillbilly SANDMAN toots his own horn, Lerch (Man of the People) offers up a T-shirt to a lucky listener who calls the B*A*R*N Hotline 1-866-646-7083 with a bit ect..MsRed gives the iggy about a upcoming ruboff, Mini Norm and Mongo keep it rollin along with topics from the world of Bubba including the latest Wedding recap & the Bubba Bar B Que twist. Find out who got chased though the aisles at Toys R Us.. The Doors are open come on into the B*A*R*N. Wishing Mr. & Mrs Bubba the Love Sponge Clem a lifetime of happiness! # 27

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 01/12/07
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army!" The B*A*R*N kicks off 2007 the the regular group on Mini Norm,Mongo, Indy, MsRedneck, & Lerch. Sirius Rich drops in to fill the group in with the fourth quarter ass kicking that Sirius Radio has delivered. Sandman deals with plumbing woes and the interns are busy making a livin.. Happy New Year Army as Bubba ties the knot, Howard & Crew visit Tampa & what do you buy the redneck couple that has everything? New years resolutions. Good Times, 2007 looks like a winner, Go Gators! # 26

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 06/23/06
item.description: "For the Army,by the Army!" The B*A*R*N welcomes the originator of the world famous "LATE NIGHT POST' found at www.bubbathelovesponge.net FROGNUTS !! His first visit to the B*A*R*N back in the Pirate Radio Days. Mongo fills in for Mini Norm as Indy, SWAT, SANDMAN, & MsRedneck help to blow up the servers with talk of Bareback on a Hogskull, Chuck Norris issues, and a Ebay iggy. Enjoy this classic B*A*R*N episode, complete wit the first episode of the Hayloft by MsRedneck ! How Bout Dat you sick Mizzarks! #3

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 07/28/06
item.description: For the Army by, the Army! Bubba Army Intelligence Officer, Texan,and Sirius Radio Fanatic, Sirius Rich pulls up a bale and chats with the B*A*R*N on various topics including the war in Iraq,politics,the oil business and his passions,Sirius Sattelite Radio & Fishin. MiniNorm,SWAT, Ms Redneck, Indy and Lerch chime in with views from a special outing to Fenway Park, Snipers on the interstate, Nascar and hybrid autos. BTLS talk the way we like it. Pay attention Bubbaetts, you may just learn sumthin. How Bout it!!!

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 12/22/06
item.description: "For the Army, by the Army!" Happy Holidays Bubbaettes!!! The B*A*R*N has wrapped up the 1st Annual Holiday Gala Show and has placed it under the tree. We desire to enhance your Holiday experience and add to your Christmas memories. Russ returns and helps the B*A*R*N celebrate the season. Mini Norm, SANDMAN, MsRedneck, Lerch, Midgetmark, Mongo, Indy and YOU the Bubba Army who took time to call in and be part of this special show. MsRed stokes the fire as she offers a new Hayloft that will take the place of sugarplums dancing in your head. Merry Christmas to all here at Podomatic. Peace and continued success in the new year. Thanks to all who have supported our efforts in 06 and know the B*A*R*N loves ya in a non faggot way. #25

item.title: The B*A*R*N Bubba Army Radio Network 08/04//2006
item.description: For the ARMY, By the ARMY! The B*A*R*N hosts longtime Bubba scholar and www.bubbathelovesponge.net poster Russ, he always keeps it real, and shares many old school Bubbaisms. This one will suprise you. Sandman, SWAT, Mini Norm, Midgetmark, MsRedneck& Mongo add to the fun. True Fans of Bubba the Love Sponge take notes, this is perhaps the greatest assembly of Bubba knowledge to date on the B*A*R*N. Say it Mizzarks!! MsRedneck wraps it up with a memorable Hayloft episode. #9
